   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          ms_enable_flags/1,
   36:          return_to/1,
   37:          system_monitor_info/1,
   38:          system_monitor_long_msgq/1,
   39:          destroy/1,
   40:          negative/1,
   41:          error_info/1,
   42:          end_of_list/1]).
   43: 
   44: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   45: 
   46: 
   47: -undef(line).
   48: -ifdef(debug).
   49: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   50: -else.
   51: -define(line,void).
   52: -endif.
   53: 
   54: -export([foo/0, exported/1, middle/1, bottom/1]).
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   59: 
   60: all() ->
   61:     [
   62:      basic,
   63:      call,
   64:      meta,
   65:      ms_enable_flags,
   66:      on_load,
   67:      trace_info_on_load,
   68:      procs,
   69:      test_set_on_spawn,
   70:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   71:      test_set_on_link,
   72:      test_set_on_first_link,
   73:      return_to,
   74:      system_monitor_info,
   75:      system_monitor_long_msgq,
   76:      destroy,
   77:      negative,
   78:      error_info,
   79:      end_of_list].
   80: 
   81: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   83:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   84: 
   85: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   86:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   87:         false ->
   88:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   89:         true ->
   90:             ignore
   91:     end.
   92: 
   93: erlang_trace(legacy, Pid, How, FlagList) ->
   94:     erlang:trace(Pid, How, FlagList);
   95: erlang_trace(Session, Pid, How, FlagList) when is_pid(Pid) ->
   96:     trace:process(Session, Pid, How, FlagList).
   97: 
   98: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   99:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
  100: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList0) ->
  101:     FlagList1 = lists:keydelete(tracer, 1, FlagList0),
  102:     FlagList3 = case lists:keytake(meta, 1, FlagList1) of
  103:                     {value, {meta,_Tracer}, FlagList2} ->
  104:                         [meta | FlagList2];
  105:                     false ->
  106:                         FlagList1
  107:                 end,
  108:     trace:function(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList3).
  109: 
  110: 
  111: on_load(_Config) ->
  112:     Tester= self(),
  113:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  114:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  115:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  116:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  117:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  118:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  119: 
  120:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  121:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  122:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  123: 
  124:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  125:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  126:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  127:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  128:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  129:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  130:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  131: 
  132:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  133:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  134:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  135:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  136: 
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  140:     Tester = self(),
  141:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  142:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  143:     1 = trace:process(S, self(), true, [call]),
  144:     0 = trace:function(S, on_load, true, []),
  145:     {all,[{traced,global},
  146:       {match_spec,[]},
  147:       {meta,false},
  148:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  149:       {call_count,false}]} = trace:info(S, on_load, all),
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  153:     Tracee = self(),
  154:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  155:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, true, []),
  156:     dummy:module_info(),
  157:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  158:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  159:     ?line,
  160:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  161:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  162:     dummy:module_info(),
  163:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  164:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  165:     ?line,
  166:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  167:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, false, []),
  168:     ok.
  169: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  170:     Tracee = self(),
  171:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  172:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  173:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  174:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  175:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  176:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  177:     dummy:module_info(),
  178:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  179:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  180:     ?line,
  181:     receive_unsorted(
  182:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  183:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  184:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  185:     dummy:module_info(),
  186:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  187:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  188:     ?line,
  189:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  190:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  191:     dummy:module_info(),
  192:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  193:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  194:     ?line,
  195:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  196: 
  197:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  198:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  202:     Tester= self(),
  203:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  204:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  205:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  206:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  207:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  208:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  209: 
  210:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  211:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  212:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  213:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  214:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  215:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  216:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  217: 
  218:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  219:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  220:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  221:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  222: 
  223:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  224:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  225:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  226: 
  227:     unlink(Tracer0),
  228:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  229:     unlink(Tracer1),
  230:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  231:     unlink(Tracer2),
  232:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  233:     ok.
  234: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  235:     Tester= self(),
  236:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  237:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  238:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  239:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  240:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  241:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  242: 
  243:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  244:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  245:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  246:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  247:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  248:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  249:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  250: 
  251:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  252:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  253:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  254:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  255: 
  256:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  257:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  258:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  259: 
  260:     unlink(Tracer0),
  261:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  262:     unlink(Tracer1),
  263:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  264:     unlink(Tracer2),
  265:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  266:     ok.
  267: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  268:     Tester= self(),
  269:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  270:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  271:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  272:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  273:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  274:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  275: 
  276:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  277:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  278:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  279:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  280:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  281:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  282:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  283: 
  284:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  285:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  286:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  287:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  288:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  289:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  290:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  291: 
  292:     unlink(Tracer0),
  293:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  294:     unlink(Tracer1),
  295:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  296:     unlink(Tracer2),
  297:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  298:     ok.
  299: 
  300: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  301:     Tester= self(),
  302:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  303:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  304:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  305:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  306:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  307:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  308: 
  309:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  310:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  311:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  312:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  313:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  314:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  315:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  316: 
  317:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  318:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  319:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  320:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  321:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  322:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  323:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  324: 
  325:     unlink(Tracer0),
  326:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  327:     unlink(Tracer1),
  328:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  329:     unlink(Tracer2),
  330:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  331:     ok.
  332: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  333:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  334:     Tracee = self(),
  335:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  336:                           receive hej ->
  337:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  338:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  339:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  340:                                   F()
  341:                           end
  342:                   end),
  343:     Child ! hej,
  344:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  345:     exit(Child, die),
  346:     receive_parallel(
  347:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  348: 
  349:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  350:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  351:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  352: 
  353:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  354:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  355:       }),
  356:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  360:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  361:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  362:     Tracee = self(),
  363:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  364:                           receive hej ->
  365:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  366:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  367:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  368:                                   F()
  369:                           end
  370:                   end),
  371:     Child ! hej,
  372:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  373:     exit(Child, die),
  374:     receive_parallel(
  375:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  376: 
  377:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  378: 
  379:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  380:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  381:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  382: 
  383:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  384:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  385:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  386: 
  387:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  388:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  389: 
  390:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  391:         {Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  392:       }),
  393: 
  394:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  395: 
  396:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  397:                            receive hej ->
  398:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  399:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  400:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  401:                                    F()
  402:                            end
  403:                    end),
  404:     Child1 ! hej,
  405:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  406:     exit(Child1, die),
  407:     receive_parallel(
  408:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  409: 
  410:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  411:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  412:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  413: 
  414:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  415:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  416:       }),
  417: 
  418:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  422:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  423:     Tracee = self(),
  424:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  425:                                 receive hej ->
  426:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  427:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  428:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  429:                                         F()
  430:                                 end
  431:                         end),
  432:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  433:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  434:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  435:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  436:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  437:     receive_parallel(
  438:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  439:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  440: 
  441:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  442:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  443:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  444: 
  445:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  446:     ok.
  447: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  448:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  449:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  450:     Tracee = self(),
  451:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  452:                                 receive hej ->
  453:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  454:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  455:                                         Tracee ! done,
  456:                                         F()
  457:                                 end
  458:                         end),
  459:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  460:     receive done -> ok end,
  461:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  462:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  463:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  464:     receive_parallel(
  465:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  466:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  467: 
  468:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  469:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  470: 
  471:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  472:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  473:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  474: 
  475:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  476:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  477:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  478:       }),
  479: 
  480:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  481:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  482:                                  receive hej ->
  483:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  484:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  485:                                          F()
  486:                                  end
  487:                          end),
  488:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  489:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  490:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  491:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  492: 
  493:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  494:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  495:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  499:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  500:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  501:     Tracee = self(),
  502:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  503:     unlink(Child),
  504:     exit(Child, die),
  505:     receive_parallel(
  506:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  507:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  508:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  509: 
  510:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  511:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  512:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  513:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  514:       }),
  515: 
  516:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  517:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  518:     link(Child2),
  519:     unlink(Child2),
  520:     exit(Child2, die),
  521:     receive_parallel(
  522:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  523:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  524:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  525: 
  526:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  527:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  528:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  529:        }),
  530: 
  531:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  532:     %% from child process
  533:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  534:     link(Child3),
  535:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  536:     unlink(Child3),
  537:     exit(Child3, die),
  538:     receive_parallel(
  539:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  540:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  541: 
  542:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  543:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  544:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  545:       }),
  546: 
  547:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  548:     %% and get messages from the parent
  549:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  550:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  551:     link(Child4),
  552:     receive_parallel(
  553:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  554:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  555: 
  556:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  557:       }),
  558:     1 = trace:process(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  559:     unlink(Child4),
  560:     exit(Child4, die),
  561:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  562: 
  563:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  564:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  565:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  566:     ok.
  567: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  568:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  569:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  570:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  571:     Tracee = self(),
  572:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  573:     unlink(Child),
  574:     exit(Child, die),
  575: 
  576:     receive_parallel(
  577:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  578:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  579:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  580: 
  581:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  582:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  583:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  584: 
  585:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  586:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  587:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  588:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  589: 
  590:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  591:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  592:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  593:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  594:       }),
  595: 
  596:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  597:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  598:     ?line,
  599:     link(Child1),
  600:     unlink(Child1),
  601:     exit(Child1, die),
  602: 
  603:     receive_parallel(
  604:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  605:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  606:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  607: 
  608:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  609:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  610:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  611: 
  612:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  613:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  614:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  615: 
  616:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  617:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  618:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  619:       }),
  620: 
  621:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  622:     %% via spawn_link/1
  623:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  624:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  625:     unlink(Child2),
  626:     exit(Child2, die),
  627:     receive_parallel(
  628:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  629:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  630:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  631: 
  632:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  633:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  634:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  635:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  636:       }),
  637:     %% Test with link/1
  638:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  639:     link(Child21),
  640:     unlink(Child21),
  641:     exit(Child21, die),
  642:     receive_parallel(
  643:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  644:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  645:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  646: 
  647:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  648:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  649:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  650:       }),
  651:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  652:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  653:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  654:     link(Child11),
  655:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  656:     receive_parallel(
  657:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  658:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  659: 
  660:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  661:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  662: 
  663:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  664: 
  665:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  666:       }),
  667:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  668:     unlink(Child11),
  669:     exit(Child11, die),
  670:     receive_parallel(
  671:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  672: 
  673:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  674: 
  675:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  676:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  677:       }),
  678: 
  679:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  680:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  681:     ok.
  682: 
  683: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  684:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  685:     Tracee = self(),
  686:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  687:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  688:     unlink(Child),
  689:     exit(Child, die),
  690:     unlink(Child1),
  691:     exit(Child1, die),
  692:     receive_parallel(
  693:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  694:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  695:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  696:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  697:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  698:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  699: 
  700:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  701:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  702:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  703:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  704:       }),
  705:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  706:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  707:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  708:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  709:     link(Child2),
  710:     link(Child21),
  711:     unlink(Child2),
  712:     unlink(Child21),
  713:     exit(Child2, die),
  714:     exit(Child21,die),
  715:     receive_parallel(
  716:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  717:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  718:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  719:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  720:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  721:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  722: 
  723:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  724:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  725:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  726:       }),
  727:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  728:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  729:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  730:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  731:                                       Tracee ! done,
  732:                                       F()
  733:                               end
  734:                    end),
  735:     link(Child3),
  736:     Child3 ! hej,
  737:     receive done -> ok end,
  738:     unlink(Child3),
  739:     exit(Child3, die),
  740:     receive_parallel(
  741:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  742:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  743:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  744: 
  745:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  746:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  747:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  748:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  749:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  750:       }),
  751:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  752:     ok.
  753: 
  754: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  755:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  756:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  757:     Tracee = self(),
  758:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  759:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  760:     receive_parallel(
  761:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  762:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  763:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  764:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  765: 
  766:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  767:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  768:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  769:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  770: 
  771:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  772:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  773: 
  774:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  775:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  776:        }),
  777: 
  778:     unlink(Child),
  779:     exit(Child, die),
  780:     unlink(Child1),
  781:     exit(Child1, die),
  782:     receive_parallel(
  783:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  784:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  785: 
  786:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  787:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  788: 
  789:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  790:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  791: 
  792:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  793:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  794:       }),
  795: 
  796:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  797:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  798:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  799:     unlink(Child2),
  800:     exit(Child2, die),
  801:     unlink(Child21),
  802:     exit(Child21, die),
  803:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  804:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  805:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  806:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  807:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  808:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  809:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  810:     ok.
  811: procs(_Config) ->
  812:     Tester= self(),
  813:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  814:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  815:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  816: 
  817:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  818: 
  819:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  820:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  821:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  822: 
  823:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  824:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  825:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  826:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  827:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  828:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  829: 
  830:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  831:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  832:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  833:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  834: 
  835:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  836:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  837:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  838: 
  839:     unlink(Tracer0),
  840:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  841:     unlink(Tracer1),
  842:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  843:     unlink(Tracer2),
  844:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  845:     ok.
  846: 
  847: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  848:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  849: 
  850:     Tracee = self(),
  851:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  852:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  853:     unregister(RegName),
  854:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  855:     link(Child),
  856:     unlink(Child),
  857:     exit(Child, die),
  858:     receive_parallel(
  859:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  860:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  861:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  862:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  863:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  864: 
  865:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  866:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  867:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  868:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  869:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  870: 
  871:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  872:     unregister(RegName),
  873:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  874:     link(Child1),
  875:     unlink(Child1),
  876:     exit(Child1, die),
  877: 
  878:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  879: 
  880:     ok.
  881: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  882:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  883:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  884: 
  885:     Tracee = self(),
  886:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  887:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  888:     unregister(RegName),
  889:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  890:     link(Child),
  891:     unlink(Child),
  892:     exit(Child, die),
  893:     receive_parallel(
  894:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  895:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  896:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  897:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  898:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  899: 
  900:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  901:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  902:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  903:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  904:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  905: 
  906:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  907:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  908:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  909:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  910: 
  911:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  912:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  913:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  914:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  915:       }),
  916: 
  917:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  918:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  919:     unregister(RegName),
  920:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  921:     link(Child1),
  922:     unlink(Child1),
  923:     exit(Child1, die),
  924:     receive_parallel(
  925:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  926:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  927:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  928:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  929:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  930: 
  931:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  932:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  933:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  934:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  935:       }),
  936: 
  937:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  938:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  939:     unregister(RegName),
  940:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  941:     link(Child2),
  942:     unlink(Child2),
  943:     exit(Child2, die),
  944:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  945:     ok.
  946: 
  947: basic(_Config) ->
  948:     Tester = self(),
  949:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  950:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  951:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  952: 
  953:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  954: 
  955:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  956:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  957:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  958: 
  959:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  960:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  961:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  962:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  963:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  964:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  965: 
  966:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  967:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  968:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  969:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  970: 
  971:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  972:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  973:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  974: 
  975:     unlink(Tracer0),
  976:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  977:     unlink(Tracer1),
  978:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  979:     unlink(Tracer2),
  980:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  981: 
  982:     ok.
  983: 
  984: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  985:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  986: 
  987:     Tracee = self(),
  988:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  989:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  990:     unregister(RegName),
  991: 
  992:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  993:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  994: 
  995:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  996: 
  997:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  998:     unregister(RegName),
  999: 
 1000:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1001: 
 1002:     ok.
 1003: 
 1004: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
 1005:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
 1006:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
 1007: 
 1008:     Tracee = self(),
 1009:     RegName = ?MODULE,
 1010:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1011:     unregister(RegName),
 1012: 
 1013:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1014:                        {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}],
 1015: 
 1016:                       [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1017:                        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]}),
 1018: 
 1019:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1020: 
 1021:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1022:     unregister(RegName),
 1023: 
 1024:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1025:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1026: 
 1027:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1028: 
 1029:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1030:     unregister(RegName),
 1031: 
 1032:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1033: 
 1034:     ok.
 1035: 
 1036: 
 1037: call(_Config) ->
 1038:     Tester = self(),
 1039:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1040:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1041:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1042: 
 1043:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1044: 
 1045:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1046:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1047:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1048: 
 1049:     [begin
 1050:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1051:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1052:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1053:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1054:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1055:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1056:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1057: 
 1058:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1059:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1060:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1061:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1062:      end
 1063:      || CallType <- [
 1064:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1065:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1066:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1067:     ],
 1068: 
 1069:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
 1070:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1071:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1072: 
 1073:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1074:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1075:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1076:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1077:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1078:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1079: 
 1080:     ok.
 1081: 
 1082: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1083:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1084:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1085:     Tracee = self(),
 1086:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1087:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1088: 
 1089:     foo(),
 1090: 
 1091:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1092: 
 1093:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1094: 
 1095:     foo(),
 1096:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1097: 
 1098:     ok.
 1099: 
 1100: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1101:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1102:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1103:     Tracee = self(),
 1104:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1105:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1106: 
 1107:     ?line,
 1108:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1109:     Call(),
 1110:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1111:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1112: 
 1113:     ?line,
 1114:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1115:     Call(),
 1116:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1117:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1118:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1119: 
 1120:     ?line,
 1121:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1122:     Call(),
 1123:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1124:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?line,
 1127:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1128:     Call(),
 1129:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1130:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1131:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1132: 
 1133:     ?line,
 1134:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1135:     Call(),
 1136:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1137:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1138: 
 1139:     ?line,
 1140:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1141:     Call(),
 1142:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1143:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1144:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1145: 
 1146:     ?line,
 1147:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1148:     Call(),
 1149:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1150:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1151: 
 1152:     ?line,
 1153:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1154:     Call(),
 1155:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1156: 
 1157:     ?line,
 1158:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1159:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1160:     Call(),
 1161:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1162: 
 1163:     ok.
 1164: 
 1165: meta(_Config) ->
 1166:     Tester = self(),
 1167:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1168:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1169:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1170: 
 1171:     meta_do(legacy, Tracer0, S1, Tracer1),
 1172:     meta_do(S1, Tracer1, legacy, Tracer0),
 1173: 
 1174:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1175:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1176:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1177:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1178:     ok.
 1179: 
 1180: meta_do(S1, Tracer1, S2, Tracer2) ->
 1181:     Tester = self(),
 1182:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1183:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1184: 
 1185:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer1}]),
 1186:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer2}]),
 1187: 
 1188:     ?line,
 1189:     foo(),
 1190:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1191:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1192: 
 1193:     ?line,
 1194:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1195:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1196:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1197: 
 1198:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1199: 
 1200:     ?line,
 1201:     foo(),
 1202:     {Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1203: 
 1204:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1205:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1206: 
 1207:     ok.
 1208: 
 1209: %% Test that enable trace flags with match spec on untraced process
 1210: %% uses session tracer and not tracer of current process.
 1211: ms_enable_flags(_Config) ->
 1212:     Tester = self(),
 1213:     Dummy = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die -> ok end end),
 1214:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1215:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1216: 
 1217:     %% Test enable trace flag on current process
 1218:     Fun = fun(EnableSend, DisableSend) ->
 1219:                   trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1220:                                  [{'_', [], [EnableSend]}],
 1221:                                  [meta]),
 1222: 
 1223:                   foo(),
 1224:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1225:                       = receive_any(),
 1226: 
 1227:                   {flags, [send]} = trace:info(S1, Tester, flags),
 1228:                   Dummy ! message,
 1229:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Tester, send, message, Dummy}} = receive_any(),
 1230: 
 1231:                   trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1232:                                  [{'_', [], [DisableSend]}],
 1233:                                  [meta]),
 1234:                   Dummy ! message,
 1235:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Tester, send, message, Dummy}} = receive_any(),
 1236:                   foo(),
 1237:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1238:                       = receive_any(),
 1239:                   {flags, []} = trace:info(S1, Tester, flags),
 1240:                   timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1241:                   ok
 1242:           end,
 1243:     Fun({trace, [], [send]}, {trace, [send], []}),
 1244:     Fun({enable_trace, send}, {disable_trace, send}),
 1245: 
 1246:     %% Test enable trace flag on other process
 1247:     Other = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die -> ok end end),
 1248:     Fun2 = fun(EnableRecv, DisableRecv) ->
 1249:                    trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1250:                                   [{'_', [], [EnableRecv]}],
 1251:                                   [meta]),
 1252: 
 1253:                   foo(),
 1254:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1255:                        = receive_any(),
 1256: 
 1257:                   {flags, ['receive']} = trace:info(S1, Other, flags),
 1258:                   Other ! message,
 1259:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Other, 'receive', message}} = receive_any(),
 1260: 
 1261:                   trace:function(S1, {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1262:                                  [{'_', [], [DisableRecv]}],
 1263:                                  [meta]),
 1264:                   Other ! message,
 1265:                   {Tracer1, {trace, Other, 'receive', message}} = receive_any(),
 1266:                   foo(),
 1267:                   {Tracer1, {trace_ts, Tester, call, {?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}}}
 1268:                        = receive_any(),
 1269:                   {flags, []} = trace:info(S1, Other, flags),
 1270:                   timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1271: 
 1272:                   ok
 1273:           end,
 1274:     Fun2({trace, Other, [], ['receive']}, {trace, Other, ['receive'], []}),
 1275:     Fun2({enable_trace, Other, 'receive'}, {disable_trace, Other, 'receive'}),
 1276: 
 1277:     ok.
 1278: 
 1279: 
 1280: return_to(_Config) ->
 1281:     %%put(display, true),  %% To get some usable debug printouts
 1282: 
 1283:     Tester = self(),
 1284:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1285:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1286: 
 1287:     Tracee = self(),
 1288:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1289:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1290: 
 1291:     1 = trace:process(S1, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1292:     1 = trace:process(S2, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1293: 
 1294:     [begin
 1295:          Traced = [{S1, Tracer1, Funcs1},
 1296:                    {S2, Tracer2, Funcs2}],
 1297: 
 1298:          %% Set up tracing for all sessions
 1299:          [begin
 1300:               trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [local]),
 1301:               [begin
 1302:                    io_format("trace:function(~p) for tracer ~p\n", [Func, Tracer]),
 1303:                    1 = trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,Func,'_'}, true, [local])
 1304:                end
 1305:                || Func <- TracedFuncs]
 1306:           end
 1307:           || {Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1308: 
 1309:          %% Execute test with both local and external calls
 1310:          [return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced)
 1311:           || MiddleCall <- [local, extern],
 1312:              BottomCall <- [local, extern]]
 1313:      end
 1314:      || Funcs1 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]],
 1315:         Funcs2 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]]
 1316:     ],
 1317: 
 1318:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1319:     ok.
 1320: 
 1321: return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced) ->
 1322:     Tracee = self(),
 1323:     Script = [{[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {body,BottomCall}, exception],
 1324:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1325:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1326:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1327:                 }},
 1328: 
 1329:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, exception],
 1330:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1331:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1332:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1333:                 }},
 1334: 
 1335:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, exception],
 1336:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1337:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1338:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1339:                 }},
 1340: 
 1341:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall},  {body,BottomCall}, return],
 1342:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1343:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1344:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1345:                 }},
 1346: 
 1347:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, return],
 1348:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,middle}],
 1349:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1350:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1351:                 }},
 1352: 
 1353:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, return],
 1354:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,top}],
 1355:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1356:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1357:                 }}
 1358:              ],
 1359: 
 1360:     [begin
 1361:          %% Make the call sequence
 1362:          io_format("CallSequence = ~p\n", [CallSequence]),
 1363:          top(CallSequence),
 1364: 
 1365:          %% Construct expected trace messages
 1366:          Exp = [[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, CallOrReturnTo, {?MODULE, Func, 1}}}
 1367:                  || {CallOrReturnTo, Func} <- maps:get(TracedFuncs, TraceMap, [])]
 1368:                 || {_Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1369: 
 1370: 
 1371:          io_format("Exp = ~p\n", [Exp]),
 1372:          receive_parallel_list(Exp)
 1373:      end
 1374:      || {CallSequence, TraceMap} <- Script],
 1375:     ok.
 1376: 
 1377: top([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1378:     display("top(catch local)"),
 1379:     [(catch middle(T)) | 1];
 1380: top([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1381:     display("top(catch extern)"),
 1382:     [(catch ?MODULE:middle(T)) | 1].
 1383: 
 1384: middle([{body,local} | T]) ->
 1385:     display("middle(local)"),
 1386:     [bottom(T) | 1];
 1387: middle([{body,extern} | T]) ->
 1388:     display("middle(extern)"),
 1389:     [?MODULE:bottom(T) | 1];
 1390: middle([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1391:     display("middle(catch local)"),
 1392:     [(catch bottom(T)) | 1];
 1393: middle([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1394:     display("middle(catch extern)"),
 1395:     [(catch ?MODULE:bottom(T)) | 1];
 1396: middle([{tail,local} | T]) ->
 1397:     display("middle(tail local)"),
 1398:     bottom(T);
 1399: middle([{tail,extern} | T]) ->
 1400:     display("middle(tail extern)"),
 1401:     ?MODULE:bottom(T).
 1402: 
 1403: bottom([return | T]) ->
 1404:     display("bottom(return)"),
 1405:     T;
 1406: bottom([exception]) ->
 1407:     display("bottom(exception)"),
 1408:     error(exception).
 1409: 
 1410: display(Term) ->
 1411:     case get(display) of
 1412:         true ->
 1413:             erlang:display(Term);
 1414:         _ ->
 1415:             true
 1416:     end.
 1417: 
 1418: io_format(Frmt, List) ->
 1419:     case get(display) of
 1420:         true ->
 1421:             io:format(Frmt, List);
 1422:         _ ->
 1423:             ok
 1424:     end.
 1425: 
 1426: 
 1427: system_monitor_info(_Config) ->
 1428:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(),
 1429: 
 1430:     S = trace:session_create(system_monitor, self(), []),
 1431: 
 1432:     ok = trace:system(S, large_heap, 1_234_567),
 1433:     {system, [{large_heap,1_234_567}]} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1434: 
 1435:     ok = trace:system(S, long_gc, 2_345),
 1436:     {system, L1} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1437:     [{large_heap,1_234_567}, {long_gc,2_345}] = lists:sort(L1),
 1438: 
 1439:     ok = trace:system(S, long_message_queue, {22,33}),
 1440:     {system, L2} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1441:     [{large_heap,1_234_567}, {long_gc,2_345}, {long_message_queue,{22,33}}] = lists:sort(L2),
 1442: 
 1443:     ok = trace:system(S, long_schedule, 3_456),
 1444:     {system, L3} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1445:     [{large_heap,1_234_567}, {long_gc,2_345},
 1446:      {long_message_queue,{22,33}},
 1447:      {long_schedule,3_456}] = lists:sort(L3),
 1448: 
 1449:     ok = trace:system(S, busy_port, true),
 1450:     {system, L4} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1451:     [busy_port,
 1452:      {large_heap,1_234_567}, {long_gc,2_345},
 1453:      {long_message_queue,{22,33}},
 1454:      {long_schedule,3_456}] = lists:sort(L4),
 1455: 
 1456:     ok = trace:system(S, busy_dist_port, true),
 1457:     {system, L5} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1458:     L5s = lists:sort(L5),
 1459:     [busy_dist_port,
 1460:      busy_port,
 1461:      {large_heap,1_234_567},
 1462:      {long_gc,2_345},
 1463:      {long_message_queue,{22,33}},
 1464:      {long_schedule,3_456}] = L5s,
 1465: 
 1466:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(),
 1467: 
 1468:     ok = trace:system(S, large_heap, false),
 1469:     {system, L6} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1470:     L6exp = lists:keydelete(large_heap, 1, L5s),
 1471:     L6exp = lists:sort(L6),
 1472: 
 1473:     ok = trace:system(S, long_message_queue, false),
 1474:     {system, L7} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1475:     L7exp = lists:keydelete(long_message_queue, 1, L6exp),
 1476:     L7exp = lists:sort(L7),
 1477: 
 1478:     ok = trace:system(S, busy_port, false),
 1479:     {system, L8} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1480:     L8exp = lists:delete(busy_port, L7exp),
 1481:     L8exp = lists:sort(L8),
 1482: 
 1483:     ok = trace:system(S, long_schedule, false),
 1484:     {system, L9} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1485:     L9exp = lists:keydelete(long_schedule, 1, L8exp),
 1486:     L9exp = lists:sort(L9),
 1487: 
 1488:     ok = trace:system(S, busy_dist_port, false),
 1489:     {system, L10} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1490:     L10exp = lists:delete(busy_dist_port, L9exp),
 1491:     L10exp = lists:sort(L10),
 1492: 
 1493:     ok = trace:system(S, long_gc, false),
 1494:     {system, []} = trace:info(S, system, all),
 1495: 
 1496:     undefined = erlang:system_monitor(),
 1497:     ok.
 1498: 
 1499: 
 1500: system_monitor_long_msgq(_Config) ->
 1501:     Tester = self(),
 1502:     Receiver = spawn_link(fun () -> message_receiver() end),
 1503: 
 1504:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
 1505:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
 1506:     S1 = trace:session_create(system_monitor_long_msgq, Tracer1, []),
 1507:     S2 = trace:session_create(system_monitor_long_msgq, Tracer2, []),
 1508: 
 1509:     sysmon_long_msgq(S1, Tracer1, S2, Tracer2, Receiver),
 1510:     sysmon_long_msgq(S2, Tracer2, S1, Tracer1, Receiver),
 1511: 
 1512:     trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1513:     trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1514: 
 1515:     unlink(Receiver),
 1516:     exit(Receiver, die),
 1517:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1518:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1519:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1520:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1521:     ok.
 1522: 
 1523: sysmon_long_msgq(S1, Tracer1, S2, Tracer2, Receiver) ->
 1524:     trace:system(S1, long_message_queue, {50,70}),
 1525:     trace:system(S2, long_message_queue, {60,80}),
 1526: 
 1527:     [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,50)],   % 50
 1528:     receive_nothing(),
 1529: 
 1530:     [begin
 1531:          [begin
 1532:               [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],   % 60
 1533:               receive_nothing(),
 1534: 
 1535:               [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],   % 70
 1536:               {Tracer1, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,true}} = receive_any(),
 1537:               receive_nothing(),
 1538: 
 1539:               [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],   % 80
 1540:               {Tracer2, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,true}} = receive_any(),
 1541:               receive_nothing(),
 1542: 
 1543:               message_receive_order(Receiver, 10),            % 70
 1544:               receive_nothing(),
 1545: 
 1546:               [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],   % 80
 1547:               receive_nothing(),
 1548: 
 1549:               message_receive_order(Receiver, 20),            % 60
 1550:               {Tracer2, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,false}} = receive_any(),
 1551:               receive_nothing(),
 1552: 
 1553:               [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],   % 70
 1554:               receive_nothing(),
 1555: 
 1556:               message_receive_order(Receiver, 20),            % 50
 1557:               {Tracer1, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,false}} = receive_any(),
 1558:               receive_nothing()
 1559:           end
 1560:           || _ <- [1,2]
 1561:          ],
 1562: 
 1563:          trace:system(S1, long_message_queue, false),
 1564: 
 1565:          [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,20)],   % 70
 1566:          receive_nothing(),
 1567: 
 1568:          [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],   % 80
 1569:          {Tracer2, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,true}} = receive_any(),
 1570:          receive_nothing(),
 1571: 
 1572:          message_receive_order(Receiver, 10),            % 70
 1573:          receive_nothing(),
 1574: 
 1575:          message_receive_order(Receiver, 10),            % 60
 1576:          {Tracer2, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,false}} = receive_any(),
 1577:          receive_nothing(),
 1578: 
 1579:          message_receive_order(Receiver, 10),            % 50
 1580:          receive_nothing(),
 1581: 
 1582:          trace:system(S1, long_message_queue, {50,70})
 1583:      end
 1584:      || _ <- [1,2]],
 1585: 
 1586:     %% Set same limits as S2
 1587:     %% and test that we can produce more than one message at a time
 1588:     trace:system(S1, long_message_queue, {60,80}),
 1589: 
 1590:     [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,29)],   % 79
 1591:     receive_nothing(),
 1592: 
 1593:     [Receiver ! message || _ <- lists:seq(1,1)],   % 80
 1594:     receive_parallel(
 1595:       {[{Tracer1, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,true}}],
 1596:        [{Tracer2, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,true}}]}),
 1597:     receive_nothing(),
 1598: 
 1599:     message_receive_order(Receiver, 19),            % 61
 1600:     receive_nothing(),
 1601: 
 1602:     message_receive_order(Receiver, 1),             % 60
 1603:     receive_parallel(
 1604:       {[{Tracer1, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,false}}],
 1605:        [{Tracer2, {monitor,Receiver,long_message_queue,false}}]}),
 1606:     receive_nothing(),
 1607: 
 1608:     message_receive_order(Receiver, 60),            % 0
 1609:     receive_nothing(),
 1610: 
 1611:     ok.
 1612: 
 1613: message_receiver() ->
 1614:     receive
 1615:         {'receive', N, From} ->
 1616:             [receive_any() || _ <- lists:seq(1,N)],
 1617:             From ! {done, N, self()}
 1618:     end,
 1619:     message_receiver().
 1620: 
 1621: message_receive_order(Receiver, N) ->
 1622:     Receiver ! {'receive', N, self()},
 1623:     receive
 1624:         {done, N, Receiver} -> ok
 1625:     end.
 1626: 
 1627: 
 1628: destroy(_Config) ->
 1629:     Name = ?MODULE,
 1630:     {_,SName1}=S1 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1631: 
 1632:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1633:     destroy_do(SName1, fun() -> trace:session_destroy(S1) end),
 1634: 
 1635:     {_,SName2}=S2 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1636: 
 1637:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1638:     put(session, S2),
 1639:     destroy_do(SName2, fun() -> erase(session),
 1640:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1641:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1642:                                ok
 1643:                       end),
 1644: 
 1645:     ok.
 1646: 
 1647: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1648:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1649:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1650:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1651:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1652:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1653:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1654: 
 1655:     1 = trace:function(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1656:     1 = trace:function(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1657:     0 = trace:function(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1658:     1 = trace:send(SName, SendMS, []),
 1659:     1 = trace:recv(SName, RecvMS, []),
 1660:     0 = trace:process(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1661:     0 = trace:port(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1662:     1 = trace:process(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1663:     1 = trace:port(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1664: 
 1665:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1666:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1667:     [SName] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1668:     SendSessions1 = trace:session_info(send),
 1669:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1670:     RecvSessions1 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1671:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1672:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1673:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1674:     [SName] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1675:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1676: 
 1677:     {traced, global} = trace:info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1678:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1679:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1680:     {match_spec, SendMS} = trace:info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1681:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1682:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1683:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1684:     {flags, [procs]} = trace:info(SName, self(), flags),
 1685:     {flags, [ports]} = trace:info(SName, Port, flags),
 1686: 
 1687:     Destroyer(),
 1688: 
 1689:     [] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1690:     [] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1691:     [] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1692:     SendSessions2 = trace:session_info(send),
 1693:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1694:     RecvSessions2 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1695:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1696:     [] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1697:     [] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1698:     [] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1699:     [] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1700: 
 1701:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1702:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1703:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1704:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1705:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1706:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1707:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1708:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1709:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1710:     true.
 1711: 
 1712: negative(_Config) ->
 1713:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1714:     SessionTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1715:     OtherTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1716:     MFA = {?MODULE, foo, 0},
 1717:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, SessionTracer, []),
 1718: 
 1719:     %% Specified tracer not allowed
 1720:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call, {tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1721:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call]),
 1722:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, false, [call]),
 1723: 
 1724:     %% Specified meta tracer not allowed
 1725:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,OtherTracer}])),
 1726:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,erl_tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1727:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, true, [meta]),
 1728:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, false, [meta]),
 1729: 
 1730:     FuncInfoItems = [all, traced, match_spec, meta, meta_match_spec,
 1731:                      call_count, call_time, call_memory],
 1732:     [{Item,undefined} = trace:info(S, {?MODULE, false, 77}, Item)
 1733:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1734:     [{Item,false} = trace:info(S, MFA, Item)
 1735:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1736: 
 1737:     trace:session_destroy(S),
 1738:     ok.
 1739: 
 1740: %% Test error reporting of module 'trace'.
 1741: error_info(_Config) ->
 1742:     %% Pick up external pid and port.
 1743:     {ok, Peer, ExternalNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1744:     ExternalPid = rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, whereis, [code_server]),
 1745:     ExternalPort = hd(rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, ports, [])),
 1746:     Tracer = spawn(fun() -> receive never -> false end end),
 1747:     TraceSession = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
 1748: 
 1749:     L = [
 1750:          {process, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1751:          {process, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, true, []]},
 1752:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1753:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1754:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1755:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [call|send]]},
 1756: 
 1757:          {port, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1758:          {port, [TraceSession, ExternalPort, true, []]},
 1759:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1760:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1761:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1762:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [send|'receive']]},
 1763: 
 1764: 
 1765:          {function, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1766:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, not_boolean, []]},
 1767:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, bad_flags]},
 1768:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1769:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [local|meta]]},
 1770:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, [{[self(), '_'],[],[]}], [call_count]]},
 1771: 
 1772:          {send, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1773:          {send, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1774:          {send, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1775: 
 1776:          {recv, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1777:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1778:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1779: 
 1780:          {info, [bad_session, self(), flags]},
 1781:          {info, [make_ref(), self(), flags]},
 1782:          {info, [atomics:new(1,[]), self(), flags]},
 1783:          {info, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, flags]},
 1784:          {info, [TraceSession, self(), bad_item]},
 1785: 
 1786:          {session_create, ["bad name", self(), []]},
 1787:          {session_create, [name, bad_tracer, []]},
 1788:          {session_create, [name, self(), bad_option]},
 1789:          {session_create, [name, self(), [bad_option]]},
 1790: 
 1791:          {session_destroy, [bad_session]},
 1792:          {session_destroy, [make_ref()]},
 1793:          {session_destroy, [atomics:new(1,[])]},
 1794: 
 1795:          {session_info, [ExternalPid]},
 1796: 
 1797:          {delivered, 2} %% Cannot fail
 1798:         ],
 1799: 
 1800:     try
 1801:         error_info_lib:test_error_info(trace, L, [allow_nyi])
 1802:     after
 1803:         peer:stop(Peer)
 1804:     end.
 1805: 
 1806: 
 1807: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1808:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1809: 
 1810: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1811: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1812:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1813:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1814: 
 1815: foo() ->
 1816:     ok.
 1817: 
 1818: exported(X) ->
 1819:     local(X).
 1820: 
 1821: local(_) ->
 1822:     ok.
 1823: 
 1824: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1825:     tracer(Name, Tester, true).
 1826: 
 1827: tracer(Name, Tester, Display) ->
 1828:     case Display of
 1829:         true -> put(display,true);
 1830:         _ -> ok
 1831:     end,
 1832:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1833: 
 1834: 
 1835: tracer_loop(Name, Tester) ->
 1836:     receive M ->
 1837:             io_format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1838:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1839:     end,
 1840:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1841: 
 1842: 
 1843: receive_any() ->
 1844:     receive_any(1000).
 1845: 
 1846: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1847:     receive M -> M
 1848:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1849:     end.
 1850: 
 1851: receive_nothing() ->
 1852:     timeout = receive_any(10).
 1853: 
 1854: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1855: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1856: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1857: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1858: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1859:     ok;
 1860: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1861:     M = receive_any(),
 1862:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1863: 
 1864: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1865:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1866:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1867:         {true, []} ->
 1868:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1869:         {true, _} ->
 1870:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1871:         {false, _} ->
 1872:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1873:     end;
 1874: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1875:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1876:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1877:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1878:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1879: 
 1880: %% Same as receive_parallel/1 but accepts a *list* of message lists
 1881: %% and the message lists are allowed to be empty meaning no expected messages.
 1882: receive_parallel_list(List0) ->
 1883:     List1 = lists:filter(fun(E) -> E =/= [] end, List0),
 1884:     receive_parallel(list_to_tuple(List1)).
 1885: 
 1886: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1887:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1888: 
 1889: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1890:     M = receive_any(),
 1891:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1892:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1893: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1894:     ok.
 1895: 
 1896: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1897:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1898:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1899:         false ->
 1900:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1901:     end;
 1902: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1903:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1904:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1905:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1906: 
 1907: 
 1908: 
 1909: match(A, A) -> true;
 1910: match('_', _) -> true;
 1911: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1912:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1913: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1914:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1915: match(_A, _B) ->
 1916:     false.
 1917: 
 1918: 
 1919: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1920:     ok.
